title: Ticket #4430: Add statistic counter for classy_counted_ptr allocations
description:
A memory leak in the collector in v8.1.6 was observed at US CMS that would exhaust their central manager of RAM every ~7 days and a second bug (network integrity checksums errantly failed when network I/O would have blocked) were both fixed.

We want to add a statistic counter to count allocated classy_counted_ptr objects to help detect similar future leaks.
